awe6.interfaces.IEncrypter

type
interface
The IEncrypter interface should be implemented by objects intending to encrypt or decrypt bytes.

Due to decompiling client side applications, encryption should not to be considered secure, merely obfuscated / hidden from plainsite.

Instance Methods

decrypt( value : haxe.io.Bytes, ?secret : String ) : haxe.io.Bytes

parameters
value The encrypted data.
?secret The secret key to encrypt the data with. Leave blank to use default secret key.
returns
Decrypted (or unobfuscated) version of the encrypted data.
Decrypts bytes.

encrypt( value : haxe.io.Bytes, ?secret : String ) : haxe.io.Bytes

parameters
value The unencrypted data.
?secret The secret key to encrypt the data with. Leave blank to use default secret key.
returns
Encrypted (or obfuscated) version of the original.
Encrypts bytes
